cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 13, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2485, Access to Congressionally Mandated Reports Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 63 (Tuesday, April 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. QUIGLEY:
H.R. 2485.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1738]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Access to Congressionally Mandated Reports Act
